title: Joel's Resume
main_content: Joel Grayson Go to Site PDF Projects Buseroo.com 2021–23 kiosk and website for students to find closest bus to any address. Homework Checker 2021–22 Chrome extension helping 2,000 students manage homework. Focus 2022 Chrome extension helping 1,000 people write distraction-free. Edit Time 2024 App with 4,000 installs that changes file date created and modified properties LirongArt.com 2020 online gallery showcasing my mom’s paintings. Venderoo 2023 built a vending machine that sold snacks in school hallway. YouTube channel 2018–now father-and-son comedy, project records, and claymation. Climate Change Brought 493 kW solar installation to Riverdale, enough to power 50 households. 2021–2024 Collected rooftop measurements, created solar models in HelioScope, gathered quotes from several installers, researched legal and financial aspects, and presented to administration and Board of Trustees. Founded Students for Electric Buses to electrify school bus fleets. 2021–2024 Gave a TEDx talk on combating climate change . 2024 Worked on connecting NYC street vendors to the electrical grid. 2023–24 En-ROADS Ambassador (climate educator). 2022–now Activities Manhattan Community Board 1 member: Environmental and Youth & Ed Committees. 2023–24 Researched novel compound for organic solar cells at NYU's Molecular Design Institute. 2023 Grade representative for five years in student government. 2019–now Violin: recitals (e.g., Praeludium & Allegro, Spring) and compositions . 2011–now Interned for the Stone House Group (energy efficiency consultants). 2021 Education Stanford University 2024–28 Riverdale Country School 2017–24 Honors: Geometry, Algebra II, Precalculus, Spanish I–VII, Biology II, Chemistry II, Physics II GPA: 3.94 (out of 4.0), SAT: 1560 Technical Skills Full-Stack Web Development: Next.js/React, TypeScript, SQL, Docker, Express, PHP, Node App Development: Swift, SwiftUI, Java, React Native, Supabase Embedded Systems: Arduino, Raspberry Pi, ESP32, Python, C++
